name: Nu Skin Enterprises, Inc.
description: Nu Skin Enterprises, Inc. is a global leader in the personal care and wellness industries, founded in 1984. The company operates in over 50 markets worldwide, offering a range of products under its Nu Skin and Pharmanex brands. Nu Skin is dedicated to providing innovative skincare and nutrition products that promote youthful-looking skin and overall health. The company's flagship product line includes ageLOC, which focuses on anti-aging solutions, and a variety of other skincare products that cater to different skin types and concerns. In addition to skincare, Nu Skin's Pharmanex line offers nutritional supplements that are scientifically formulated to support health and well-being. The company uses a direct selling model, empowering independent distributors to sell its products and build their own businesses. Nu Skin is also committed to corporate social responsibility, engaging in various philanthropic efforts through its Nourish the Children initiative, which aims to combat global childhood malnutrition. With a focus on innovation, Nu Skin continually invests in research and development to enhance its product offerings and meet the evolving needs of consumers. The company’s mission is to be a force for good, improving lives through its high-quality products and meaningful business opportunities.

seo.meta_title: Nu Skin Enterprises, Inc. | Personal Care and Wellness Products
seo.meta_description: Discover Nu Skin Enterprises, a leader in personal care and wellness. Explore innovative skincare and nutritional products designed for health and beauty.

faq.question: What products does Nu Skin offer?
faq.answer: Nu Skin offers skincare products, nutritional supplements, and anti-aging solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Nu Skin?
faq.answer: Ryan Napierski is the CEO of Nu Skin Enterprises, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Nu Skin headquartered?
faq.answer: Nu Skin is headquartered in Provo, Utah, USA.
